title: Use Case 5 Dataset
description: Semantic model for the UC5 dataset evaluating real-time detection and resource-efficiency metrics.

intent.description: Purpose of the dataset (e.g., object or event detection).

algorithm.description: Algorithm used for detection or classification.

frame_rate_fps.description: Processing frame rate in frames per second.

detection_accuracy.description: Proportion of correctly detected events or objects.

false_positive_rate.description: Proportion of false positives among detections.

scalability.description: Scalability metric representing performance across increased load.
